original_text: He gave you a job to do. He told you, “Go and kill all those wicked Amalekites. Fight against them until you have destroyed them all.”
korean_text: 또 여호와께서 왕을 길로 보내시며 이르시기를 가서 죄인 아말렉 사람을 진멸하되 다 없어지기까지 치라 하셨거늘

sentences.original_text: He gave you a job to do.
Go and kill all those wicked Amalekites.
sentences.korean_translation: 가서 그 모든 악한 아말렉 사람들을 죽이십시오.

sentences.original_text: until you have destroyed them all.
